"Beverly": "All the crazy strong ARKS go to train in the Trinitas. Even Retem only has a few dudes who can go."
"Dunno the deets, but I hear it's hell in there. They totally swamp you with enemies."
"Even making it a little ways into it is a big deal."
"...Huh? You want me to go too?"
"Why not...? Duh. It's scary as hell!"
